resources.string: Backup file name is now configurable.
Icons for payment methods can be customized.
Transaction list can be sorted by amount.
Files in application folder (backups and exports) can be shared or deleted.
Import into multiple accounts from one CSV file
New strategy for managing duplicate payer/payee information
Attach arbitrary number of images and documents (PDF)
Home Screen Widget displaying current state of budget.
Categories can now be configured as expense or income categories, which will impact how the expense and income sums are calculated.
Transfers can be mapped to categories.
When screen lock is enabled, allow to opt-out of disabling screenshots.
Menu on main screen can be fully customized.
